about_the_game:
• This is a game set in a confined space with permanent death that keeps you on edge every second. In this dynamic world, you are forced to constantly move, search for keys to locked rooms, and find ways to escape. To survive, the player must use potions with various effects—from damaging potions to buffs—but their supply is limited, and every decision can be fatal. Each room presents new challenges, and permanent death forces you to think through every move carefully. This game will be a true test of your agility, strategy, and ability to adapt to unpredictable situations.

  • Each adventure is unique thanks to procedurally generated chests that hide keys and potions. You never know what awaits behind the next door. Every chest you open could be a lifesaving opportunity or force you to take even greater risks.

  • Keys are an essential part of progression, allowing you to unlock doors to the next rooms. They come in several types, each with its own unique theme. Bloody keys require sacrifice or combat, Stone keys symbolize strength, Ice keys are frozen in traps that must be overcome, and Archkeys are rare, unlocking access to special objects.

  • Potions are your main allies in the fight for survival, but their power can also be your downfall. Each potion has a unique effect, but works both ways, so recklessness can cost you your life. The most important and valuable is the poison potion, which can remove the curse from doors, unlocking the way forward. But be cautious: if you miss or, worse, hit yourself, your journey ends here and now. Using potions requires precision, calculation, and composure, as every action could be decisive.

  • A key feature of the game is its built-in ecosystem for speedrun fans. You can track your completion time for each room and overall progress directly during gameplay. This allows you to analyze your actions, refine your tactics, and compete against yourself. It adds challenges for the fastest and most agile players, making every second crucial in your journey.

  • After the death of your father, the king, traitors stripped you of your right to inherit and imprisoned you on the Isle of Exile in the form of a maid. Princess, escape, but beware of him...

name: Maiden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10 X64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K | AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB | AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB | Intel Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 11 X64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700 | AMD Ryzen 7 5700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti | NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 | AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
